item.title: What we do
item.description:
We compute

  • Relevant signals of real-world dynamic systems
  • Using sensor data
  • Efficiently implemented on YOUR target

Typical challenges we solve

  • Complex relation between the signals and the system.
  • Low-latency output
  • Complex system dynamics.
  • Failure detection.
  • Dealing with slowly changing systems, adatp to wear and tear.

Signals and sensors include

  • Inertial sensing
  • Gas sensing (e.g. metal-oxide sensors)
  • LVDT’s
  • Signals of opportunity, such as a driving voltage

Application domains include

  • Tracking of robotic links
  • Navigation
  • Air quality sensing
  • Human motion tracking
  • Physiological systems
